com.ikalagaming.gui

Class CommandHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikalagaming.gui.CommandHistory

  • public class CommandHistory
extends java.lang.Object
    A list of previously typed commands.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommandHistory()
      Constructs a command history with the default size.
      CommandHistory(int maxLines)
      Constructs a new command history with a maxiumum size as provided.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItem(java.lang.String command)
      Adds an item to the end of the list.
      int getMaxLines()
      Returns the maximum number of items that will be stored in the history.
      java.lang.String getNext()
      Returns the next value in the history, if it exists.
      java.lang.String getPrevious()
      Returns the previous value in the history, if it exists.
      boolean hasNext()
      Returns true if there is a string after the current position in the history.
      boolean hasPrevious()
      Returns true if there is a string before the current position in the history.
      void setMaxLines(int maxLines)
      Sets the maximum number of items that will be stored in the history.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandHistory

        public CommandHistory()
        Constructs a command history with the default size.
        See Also:
        CommandHistory(int)

      • CommandHistory

        public CommandHistory(int maxLines)
        Constructs a new command history with a maxiumum size as provided.
        Parameters:
        maxLines - the max history size
        See Also:
        CommandHistory()

    • Method Detail

      • setMaxLines

        public void setMaxLines(int maxLines)
        Sets the maximum number of items that will be stored in the history.
        Parameters:
        maxLines - the max history size

      • getMaxLines

        public int getMaxLines()
        Returns the maximum number of items that will be stored in the history.
        Returns:
        the max history size

      • addItem

        public void addItem(java.lang.String command)
        Adds an item to the end of the list. Items at the beginning of the list are removed if they are past the max history size.
        Parameters:
        command - the item to add

      • hasPrevious

        public boolean hasPrevious()
        Returns true if there is a string before the current position in the history. If the history is empty or we are at the first entry, returns false.
        Returns:
        true if there is a string before the current one

      • getPrevious

        public java.lang.String getPrevious()
        Returns the previous value in the history, if it exists. This moves the current position backwards one if it does have a previous value. If no object exists, returns an empty string.
        Returns:
        the previous command in the history

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext()
        Returns true if there is a string after the current position in the history. If the history is empty or we are at the last entry, returns false.
        Returns:
        true if there is a string after the current one

      • getNext

        public java.lang.String getNext()
        Returns the next value in the history, if it exists. This moves the current position forward one if it does have a next value. If no object exists, returns an empty string.
        Returns:
        the next command in the history
